author: CBS News
title: Watch live: Coronavirus Task Force gives update on response
description: President Trump has painted a sobering picture of the toll the virus is expected to take on the country.
content: Members of the Coronavirus Task Force, charged with leading the U.S. response to the coronavirus pandemic, are holding a briefing Wednesday at 5 p.m. after the country suffered its deadliest day since the outbreak began. At least 865 people lost their battles… [+1094 chars]
